Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.3 Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka » 13.3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 13.3.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 13.3.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Piṭṭhiduka
Dassanenapahātabbahetukaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
52.
4182Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate nava.
<< 13.3.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup13.3.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya >>
